content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. How much were you thinking of offering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the unfurnished state of the apartment and its location, I was thinking of 500 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but that's quite low for an apartment of this size and location. The city center is a highly sought-after area, and I believe my property deserves a higher price. How about 650 euros per month? This would still be a fair deal for you, considering the amenities and the new construction.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the new construction and location, but the unfurnished state of the apartment makes it less desirable. I'm willing to pay 550 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 550 euros is still not acceptable. The apartment is in excellent condition, and the location is prime. I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates the value of the property. How about 600 euros per month? This is a fair compromise, I believe.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment, I think 575 euros per month would be more reasonable.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hmm, 575 euros is closer to what I'm looking for, but I believe the apartment's worth even more. It's a brand-new construction with all the modern amenities, and the location is unbeatable. How about we meet in the middle at 590 euros per month? This is a good deal for you, considering the quality of the apartment and its prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 575 euros per month!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept 575 euros per month. The apartment is worth more than that. I believe the market value for this property is closer to 600 euros per month. If you're not willing to pay that, I'm afraid we cannot come to an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price difference is too large and I don't want to overpay for the unfurnished state of the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your position, but I'm also firm on mine. The apartment's location and condition justify the asking price. If you're not willing to pay 600 euros per month, I'm afraid we cannot proceed with the rental. Thank you for your time, and I hope you find a suitable apartment elsewhere.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
